base__title.value: Hello, my name is Liam Goldfinch.

body_copy.value:
I currently work as a .NET developer for the digital web agency NetConstruct.

We specialise in building websites for Kentico Xperience, Kentico Kontent and Umbraco CMS platforms.

I am a certified developer for Kentico Xperience and Kentico Kontent, and an active member of the Kentico open source community.

This website has been built using the headless CMS Kentico Kontent and a static site generator GatsbyJS.  If you're wondering how, then head on over to the repository on GitHub and you'll be able to see the source code.  Content updates are pushed through an Azure function, which triggers a GitHub Action to recompile the site and publish the updated static site to GitHub Pages.
